ing: 1 pound fully cooked kielbasa or Polish sausage, cut into 1/4-inch slices
1 (15.5 ounce) can kidney beans, rinsed and drained
n: Blame the Dog Bean Casserole (Kielbasa and Bean Dish)
des: "This recipe has been a favorite for 30 years. Great at picnics as a side dish, where the guys gave it it's nickname (Blame the Dog). Serve this alone as a main dish with coleslaw and crusty rolls, or as a side dish."
ins:
Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Combine sausages, baked beans, kidney beans, tomato sauce, ketchup, red wine, onion, celery, garlic, mustard, and Worcestershire sauce in a 3-quart baking dish. Bake in preheated oven until hot and bubbly, about 1 hour.
